extendedInfo.description: It's time to get this important music theory concept under your belt once and for all! And now you can do it in no time at all. Here is an effective way to memorize the circle of fifths and all of the II-V-I progressions. And doing your best to achieve the highest score on each drill adds an element of fun. The circle of fifths drill gets progressively more difficult, leaving more and more chords missing until you are recalling the chords purely from memory. You can drill yourself on the circle of fifths with either major chords or the relative minor chords. In the II-V-I drill you must identify the missing chord as you try to accumulate the highest score. In either drill, you can choose whether to view chord name incidentals as either all sharps or all flats. You'll never regret mastering this bit of musical knowledge!

reviews.title: Very Poor
reviews.comment: The graphics are terrible. It is remarkable how bad this app looks. For a free app it would be bad but to pay for it is a joke. As far as functionality goes, it is merely a revision tool. You\'ll have to learn your theory elsewhere and just use this to revise with. If you can bear to look at it that is...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Save your cents
reviews.comment: Crummy interface, no in-app help, no explanation of what to do.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Plz add landscape view for tablets.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ok\'ish
reviews.comment: Aids learning but has a bug which records correct answers as wrong when switching between major and minor
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: This is a huge help to get me up to snuff on my music theory!
reviews.author: A Google User
